location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Sir Evan Nepean, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter notes the arrival at Bushire of its new Governor, Medhey Kholee Khan [Mahdi Quli Khan]. William Bruce reports that the Governor has requested that Mahomed Neuby Khan [Muhammad Nabi Khan, former Governor of Bushire]'s ship, the Daria Beggy,be detained at Bushire. Bruce also states that he has been nominated by His Excellency Sir Gore Ouseley as joint commissioner for the settlement of Mahomed Neuby Khan's accounts, alongside Hagee Mahomed Hossain Khan [Muhammad Husain Khan]. Includes a copy of a translation of a letter, received 16 July 1813, from Hagee Mahomed Hossain Khan to Bruce.
